TopicTitle: POGO: Simple, safe, CHEAP mid-tech orbital rescue SSTO

Articles.Content:
Here's what I've been using to grab additional crew from LKO cheaply and quickly. No frills at all on this ship--not even landing gear! But it works.

![cYKCoj7.png](http://i.imgur.com/cYKCoj7.png)
